main event: A bright white light was observed over Pleasantville, Pennsylvania on May 25, 1964, lasting about 2 minutes with movement at high speed.
interesting points: The light was much brighter than the moon and streaked with blue., The object disappeared and reappeared multiple times during the observation., A local pastor also reported seeing a similar 'ball of fire' several days later., Witnesses felt as if they were observing something from another world., There was no sound associated with the sightings.
sighted object: brilliant white light with yellow-orange hue
witness description: Two men observed the light while driving; details include close proximity and brightness compared to car headlights.
